SELECT T.MEM_ID, T.MEM_NM, T.ROOM_CODE, T.MEM_TELNO, T.SIGN_DT, B.DANJI_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SIGN_DT ASC) AS RNUM, MEM_ID, MEM_NM, ROOM_CODE, MEM_TELNO, SIGN_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MVI_STATUS = 'mvi01' AND MEM_AUTH = 'ROLE_ADMIN'
) T LEFT JOIN DANJI B ON T.ROOM_CODE = B.DANJI_CODE WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN ((#{curPage}*10)- (10-1)) AND (#{curPage}*10) ORDER BY T.SIGN_DT ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MVI_STATUS = 'mvi01' AND MEM_AUTH = 'ROLE_ADMIN'

SELECT T.MEM_ID, T.MEM_NM, T.ROOM_CODE, T.MEM_TELNO, T.REG_DT, B.DANJI_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REG_DT ASC) AS RNUM, MEM_ID, MEM_NM, ROOM_CODE, MEM_TELNO, REG_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MVI_STATUS = 'mvi02' AND MEM_AUTH = 'ROLE_ADMIN'
) T LEFT JOIN DANJI B ON T.ROOM_CODE = B.DANJI_CODE WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN ((#{curPage}*10)- (10-1)) AND (#{curPage}*10) ORDER BY T.REG_DT ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MVI_STATUS = 'mvi02' AND MEM_AUTH = 'ROLE_ADMIN'
SELECT B.DANJI_NAME FROM MEMBER A, DANJI B WHERE A.ROOM_CODE = B.DANJI_CODE AND A.ROOM_CODE = #{roomCode}
SELECT A.MEM_ID, A.MEM_TELNO, A.MEM_NM, A.MEM_EMAIL, B.DANJI_NAME FROM MEMBER A, DANJI B WHERE A.ROOM_CODE = B.DANJI_CODE AND MEM_ID = #{memId}
